# Template for `cls` export file

## Variables

- `{{COMPONENT_NAME}}`: React component name.
- `{{CLASS_NAMES_TYPE}}`: Typescript Record with CSS class names from .scss file.

## Make changes within the following code block

```typescript
import { bem } from '@andrey/bem';
import styles from './{{COMPONENT_NAME}}.module.scss';

export const cls = bem(styles as {{CLASS_NAMES_TYPE}});

```
